ModMetaData.name: VGP Garden Fabrics (No Loom Patch)
ModMetaData.author: Maaxar
ModMetaData.description:
Removes the Loom and Electric Loom from dismarzero's VGP Garden Fabrics and moves the recipes to the tailoring benches.
VGP Garden Fabrics - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007062162 VGP Garden Fabrics Simplified - https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2007062335
Works for both the Full and Simplified versions VGP Garden Fabrics. Should be loaded after VGP Garden Fabrics.
